features: ⚪[PAD REFILL ONLY] : This product is a refill for toner pads and does not include a storage case.
⚪[SQUARE PADS FOR DAY & NIGHT CARE] : Mediheal soothing cotton face pads are ideal day and night daily toner pads that offer a quick skin fix.
⚪[VIGAN FIBER] : These pads are made with vegan fibers with rounded corners to ensure a perfect fit.
⚪[CALMING PADS] : Madecassoside Pads to calm and help reduce blemishes and dark spots on uneven, post-acne skin.
⚪[HOW TO USE] : After cleansing, apply on any areas (forehead, cheeks, and chin) for quick and easy intensive skin care.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This product is a refill product for pads. PAD REFILL ONLY This product is a refill for toner pads and does not include a storage case. If you are purchasing a toner pad for the first time, we recommend that you purchase the toner pad product first, not the refill product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: Best toning pads I have used. Gentle on the skin as it gives you a mild exfoliation without leaving the skin too sensitive. Gentle enough to be used twice daily but I only use it in the morning and the retinol version at night. There is a mild scent but nothing too rancid for my liking and each pad is always soaked, so you don’t have to worry about how much liquid product you’re getting because you’re getting a lot for the value you’re paying. I am on my refill of these toning pads and I must say that my face looks so dewy and glowy. I also notice less acne and breakouts but I do not notice that it does anything for my dark spots —However, I will continue to use this for now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refill box only, doesn’t come with product container
reviews.reviewText: Usually I order my toner pads from Mediheal’s website, but I didn’t want to keep buying the actual container with it since I already have one. Thankfully, they sell refills on Amazon because I love this brand, I’ve been using it for two months now. I also saw a review saying this is not the real product, but it IS. After opening the shipping box, you could see the Mediheal paper/packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for textured skin
reviews.reviewText: I have tried two different types of these pads and I’m obsessed. My skin is starting to get glowy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SOME PEOPLE DON’T KNOW HOW TO READ
reviews.reviewText: This product works really well, and I've been using it for a year now. This product is ONLY A REFILL, which means it doesn’t come with a container or tweezers. To those people who gave it less stars because it’s only a refill, you know who’s the problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle on skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars broke me out very bad
reviews.reviewText: i bought these as a cheaper option because it’s a refill and i wanted to give them a try. First of all, the scent is extremely strong literally smells like a cleaning product. Regardless, i gave it a try because of all the amazing reviews on tiktok. It turned my skin so red and i do not have sensitive skin. It broke me out so bad and it’s been almost 3 months since i stopped using them and i still haven’t been able to clear my skin from the breakouts i got from this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Refill only (no original packaging)
reviews.reviewText: This is a toner pad that's gone viral recently - I didn't realize when I bought this that it is only a replacement. Meaning that once you open this it cannot be resealed. I just put the entire box in a zip lock bag to avoid having to buy the container in order to resolve the issue. The pads feel slightly rough and I worry a little that it might be mildly abrasive but maybe that's a good thing. I've heard that it can also be used as a kind of face mask (just put multiple pads all over your face and let it soak up the toner). I tried this once but not sure what it did for my skin honestly. I also am not sure I've seen any marked improvement since I've started using these either. But it can't hurt, I suppose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t realize this was the refill but either way I’ve been using it for weeks now and my skin looks clearer and keeping that pads cold is the best thing
